EmailTemplate.name: HINT IHF event
EmailTemplate.subject: Meet HINT - our new Hotel INvestment Tool
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
HINT - Hotel INvestment Tool
Reduce the risk of investing in the hotels market with HINT (Hotel INvestment Tool).
Meet HINT. We'd like to introduce you to our simple-to-use interactive tool which can help make investment decisions easier.
HINT launches today at the International Hotel Investment Forum (IHIF) and also online at aecom.com/hint where you can trial a simplified version.
Stay updated Want to keep informed about the latest HINT developments? Follow us on Twitter at twitter.com/economicsaecom, or drop us an email at hint@aecom.com
The team behind HINT Over the past few years AECOM has been working hard to develop HINT. Our Economics and Cost Consultancy teams have combined their knowledge to build a tool which we hope you will find useful and easy-to-use.
AECOM, MidCity Place, London, 71 High Holborn, London, WC1V 6QS, United Kingdom
